name: Into the fancasm
description:
Into the screen shooter where the twist is your health is your speed.

Up arrows (green) increase health, speed, and score multiplier.

Getting hit lowers the speed/health, and hitting zero will make you lose.

Down arrows (yellow) decrease speed/health, but won't go below min speed.

arrows/wasd - move

l mouse/l control - fire
r mouse/r alt - reset on death

esc -close
